coza.opencollab.synthesis.push.service

Interface PushDeviceTupleService


  • public interface PushDeviceTupleService
    Interface for managing PushDeviceTuple instances.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<PushDeviceTuple> findNextQueued(String platform, int maxItem)
      Finds the next batch of unsent push notifications for a platform The implementation of the service will make sure that the size of the list is the size that can be handled by the platform sending implementation.
      List<PushDeviceTuple> findTuplesForPush(Long pushId)
      Service Method to find all PushDeviceTuple associated with a given Push.
      List<PushDeviceTuple> findUnsentTuples()
      Service Method to find all unsent PushDeviceTuple and return them as a List PushDeviceTuple.
      List<PushDeviceTuple> getQueue()
      Gets the queue.
      void markTupleAsSent(PushDeviceTuple tuple)
      Service Method to mark a specific PushDeviceTuple as sent.
      PushDeviceTuple saveTuple(PushDeviceTuple tuple)
      Service Method to save a given PushDeviceTuple.

      • findNextQueued

        List<PushDeviceTuple> findNextQueued(String platform,
                                   int maxItem)
        Finds the next batch of unsent push notifications for a platform The implementation of the service will make sure that the size of the list is the size that can be handled by the platform sending implementation.
        Parameters:
        platform - Name of the platform to get the next queued items of
        maxItem - the max item
        Returns:
        List of unsent tuples that are ready to be sent
